{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.24056v1", "title": "Moment polytopes of toric exponential families", "summary": "We show that the moment polytope of a K\"ahler toric manifold, constructed as
the torification (in the sense of M. Molitor, K\"ahler toric manifolds from
dually flat spaces, arXiv:2109.04839, 2021) of an exponential family defined on
a finite sample space, is the projection of a higher-dimensional simplex.", "main_category": "math.DG", "categories": "math.DG", "published": "2025-03-31T13:17:20Z"}
